1412400.name: Zoxel
1412400.description:
A Voxel RPG in a Vast, Procedurally Generated Universe

Welcome, Traveler.

You seem lost.
Perhaps youâ€™re searching for adventure and riches?
No? Then maybe a quieter lifeâ€”tending crops beneath alien skies, far from the endless noise of the City.

But deep down, you know the truth.

Youâ€™re searching for purpose.

Endlessly wandering these worlds, driven forward by something you canâ€™t quite nameâ€¦
A pull that never fadesâ€”no matter how far you travel, or how dangerous the path becomes.

Your Journey Begins

You awaken on a distant planet, in lands unknown. With nothing but your body and your will to survive, you take on quests from local villagersâ€”hoping, at first, simply not to die.

As you grow stronger, you develop your attributes and skills, tackle greater challenges, and descend into dangerous dungeons in search of rare treasures. Along the way, fragments of your past begin to surface as you explore deeper into the ever-expanding multiverse.

Every world tells a story.
Every decision shapes whoâ€”or whatâ€”you become.

Features

  • Fully Generate and Customize Your Voxel Body

  • Improve Attributes and Skills

  • Equip Gear or Replace Body Parts

  • Manage Hunger and Stamina

  • Unlock Classes: Warrior, Mage, or Rogue

  • Purchase Skills through Deep Skill Trees

  • Unlock Jobs: Miner, Lumberjack, Herbalist

  • Buy a House, Shop, or Farm in Town

  • Raise Penguin Farms to support your growing penguin family ğŸ§

  • Gather, Plunder, and Craft Unique Items

  • Trade with NPCs or Take on Quests

  • Discover Unique Races and Their DNA

  • Explore the Darkest, Most Dangerous Dungeons

  • Travel Across a Procedurally Generated Universe of Voxel Planets

  • Jump Through Dimensional Portals

  • Everything is Procedurally Generated

Zoxel is Open!
